main.name: Daniel Schaaf
main.description: I am a Full Stack web development Engineer, That specializes in JavaScript, C# and React
main.bio: I am a 7 year army veteran who served two tours overseas in Iraq(2008-2009, 2010-2011).I am a recent graduate of the Epicodus Coding Academy, where i learned Full Stack web development using languages C#, JavaScript, React,HTML5,CSS.I also have knowledge in the Java and Python languages as i have taken college courses in Python and Java.
main.contactmessage: Please if you want to get in contact with me please send me an Email at the following email.

resume.skillmessage: Here you can create a short write-up of your skills to show off to employers

education.description: At Epicodus, I learned about the programming languages of JavaScript, HTML, CSS, C#, React, and .NET. I learned about the best coding practices, from refactoring long code by using recursive and loop statements. i learned that development teams are the foundation, and being able to work with anyone makes you a better programmer.
took courses in Java and Python

work.title: Full Stack Developer Intern
work.description: Developed React Native Mobile Application to upload video to AWS S3 bucket and live stream video to Ant-media server

work.title: Territory Sales Executive
work.description: Outside sales representative that is skilled in prospecting and value selling to high valued customers. I maintained a high sales output throughout my time a Comcast.

work.title: Computer System Analyst
work.description: I worked as a system analyst working on the JADOCS 2.0 project testing and finding problems in the development. i specialized in developing testing procedures for the software and working hand in hand with the development teams working on the project.

skills.name: Git
skills.description: I use Git for all of my projects so far. I have used Git for version control in small teams and have toyed around with contributing to Open Source Projects.

skills.name: Java
skills.description: Java is the second programming language i learned while i was at North Seattle College.

skills.name: React Js
skills.description: I learned React as part of my front end training at Epicodus. I did not like to use it at first especially when adding redux, to applications. it has grown on me as i used it for my Capstone project for Epicodus.

skills.name: C#
skills.description: C# was the Back end language that i learned while i was at Epicodus. I feel the most comfortable with this language to build out websites, as Dotnet MVC is very easy to use.

skills.name: Python
skills.description: The first programming language that i learned at North Seattle, by far the coolest programming language i have learned.

skills.name: Bootstrap
skills.description: I use Bootstrap more often than not when designing the layout for my sites. It is the framework I am most familiar with and can therefore design more quickly than with others.

skills.name: MySQL
skills.description: The First Database tech that i learned. it is very easy to use.

skills.name: JavaScript
skills.description: The first programming language that i learned at Epicodus, i am the most familiar with it and tend to always look to go back to this as i design out my projects.

projects.title: Stock-Market Watch App
projects.category: A web application built during the first Team week at Epicodus that lets people create watch lists out of real-time stock data

projects.title: Fun With Sara
projects.category: This is a website that i built for my Wife as my Capstone At Epicodus
